trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Winter Park
There were no other sightings in Winter Park on or around December 22nd 2012
divs: sighting detailsi and my g\f were walking up aloma, towards the west (and the setting sun), when we observed a bright (not just bright, were talking "what the hell was that", brighter than the sun bright) object a few relative feet from the sun (as it was setting), that got intensely bright, faded to a pinpoint, went out, and came back a few more times before just plain going out completely. when it was fading, it looked like venus in brightness and size. when it first lit up tho, it was almost 1\10th the size of the sun. no sound, contrails, sonic boom, etc. i believe it was something blowing up in space, or a nova (or even supernova- cant find anything online about one, though.) it lasted for a good 5 minutes.
